duties_responsibilities.duty: Processing bankruptcy information from U.S. Bankruptcy Courts, Clients, Attorneys, and/or Trustees.
Reviewing and processing accounts/cases through reports or queues in Workflow systems.
Researching loan documentation issues, loan balances, payments, charges, and customer liability on all loan systems.
Maintaining a working knowledge of bankruptcy law and codes.

Assisting in the management of bankruptcy cases by ensuring Proofs of Claim are filed accurately and timely, preparing and filing bankruptcy motions, and processing daily mail and work critical event reports that are applicable to Truist accounts.

education_certification.credential: 18 months of bankruptcy experience and/or mastery of all skills expected at the Bankruptcy Production Specialist I role
